text: Dipak Bhattacharjee was an Indian politician. He was elected as MLA of Hailakandi Vidhan Sabha Constituency in Assam Legislative Assembly in 1978. He died on 29 January 2019 at the age of 79. ==References== Category:2019 deaths Category:Assam MLAs 1978–1983 Category:Communist Party of India (Marxist) politicians Category:Bengali politicians
title: Dipak Bhattacharjee
